dict.acceptation: 金（黄）色的；金质的；美好的 ；

sent.orig: Cation golden yellow bismuth dyestuff is synthesized by cation golden yellow and bismuth nitrate.
sent.trans: 本文以阳离子金黄和硝酸铋为原料合成了阳离子金黄铋染料。

sent.orig: These were golden years-really fucking golden.
sent.trans: 这些黄金年-真的他妈的金。

sent.orig: The golden rule is that there are no golden rules.
sent.trans: 没有什么金科玉律，就是金科玉律。

sent.orig: Some people blame Californier Californians themselves for the current troubles golden state of the Golden State.
sent.trans: 一些人批评是加州政府自身造成了加州目前的困难。

sent.orig: The Golden Rule is that there are no golden rules.
sent.trans: 真正的金科玉律就是世上并无金科玉律。
